alert.note: Alert for Atchison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:55AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Atchison County through 630 AM CDT... At 554 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nemaha, or 10 miles east of Auburn, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Rock Port, Fairfax, Westboro and Phelps City. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 102 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northwestern Missouri.
